name: Mirage (itch) (PaulBourdeau, Doriane Claireaux, Martin Arribard, BlastMx, Synlike, muler66, lord-cael)
name_original: Mirage (itch) (PaulBourdeau, Doriane Claireaux, Martin Arribard, BlastMx, Synlike, muler66, lord-cael)
description:
"Make your life a dream, and a dream a reality."  Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

Every night, you dive into a world you don't recognize. However, a tower in the distance beckons you. Just looking at it makes you feel nostalgic. Your goal is therefore simple : to reach this mysterious tower...

  • Unfortunately, the way to the tower is paved with traps and obstacles.
  • Dreams don't last forever. You have to reach the tower before you wake up.

This game was created during the Ludum Dare 47. The gamejam's theme was Stuck in a Loop.

Team

Project Manager : Paul Bourdeau

Game Designers / Level Designers : Nicolas Poittevin / Jules Seigneur

Game Developers : Maxence Colas / David Duhem

Game Artist 3D : Martin Arribard

Game Artist 2D : Doriane Claireaux

Sound Designer: Jean-Baptiste Mar
